examples.korean: We hung her portrait above the fireplace. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그녀의 초상화를 벽난로 위에 걸었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We hung her portrait above the fireplace. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to sit for your portrait 듣기 Add to Wordbook (화가 앞에서 포즈를 취하고) 자기 초상화를 그리게 하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to sit for your portrait Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He had his portrait painted in uniform. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 제복을 입고 (화가를 시켜) 자기 초상화를 그렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had his portrait painted in uniform. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The face is the portrait of the mind; the eyes, its informers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼굴은 마음의 초상, 눈은 그 마음의 밀고자이다. (라틴속담, 지혜속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: The face is the portrait of the mind; the eyes, its informers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is not easy to draw a portrait. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 초상화를 그리는 것은 쉽지 않다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: It is not easy to draw a portrait. Add to Wordbook
